loginPage.title: FireDesk
loginPage.description: Sign in to access the help desk.
loginPage.terms: By signing in, you agree to our terms of service.

dashboardPage.filtersSearchDescription: Filter tickets by status, priority, or search by title/description.

ticketForm.createDescription: Fill out the form below to submit a new support ticket. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
ticketForm.titlePlaceholder: e.g., App not loading on startup
ticketForm.titleDescription: A brief summary of your issue.
ticketForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the issue in detail...
ticketForm.descriptionDescription: Provide as much detail as possible, including steps to reproduce the issue if applicable.
ticketForm.attachmentsDragDrop: Drag & drop files here, or click to select.
ticketForm.attachmentsLimits: Up to {maxFiles} files, {maxFileSizeMB}MB each. Images & videos accepted.
ticketForm.attachmentsDescription: Attach screenshots, videos, or logs to help explain the issue.
ticketForm.uploadFailedFetchError: Failed to upload {fileName}. Check network connection and R2 CORS settings.
ticketForm.uploadErrorsMessage: Some files failed to upload. Please remove them or retry.

errorCreatingTicket.title: Error Creating Ticket
errorCreatingTicket.description: There was a problem submitting your ticket. Please try again.

newTicket.subject: FireDesk Ticket Created: {ticketTitle} (#{shortTicketId})
newTicket.heading: New Ticket Created: {ticketTitle}
newTicket.body: Thank you for submitting your support ticket. Your ticket (#{shortTicketId}) has been received and is now being processed.
newTicket.statusNote: It has been assigned to our default support agent and its current status is Open.
newTicket.followUp: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

newTicket.subject: New FireDesk Ticket (Assigned): {ticketTitle} by {creatorName} (#{shortTicketId})
newTicket.heading: New Ticket Submitted
newTicket.body: A new support ticket has been submitted by {creatorName} (UID: {userId}).
newTicket.statusNote: The ticket has been automatically assigned to the default support agent and its status is Open.

newTicketAssigned.subject: New Ticket Assigned to You: {ticketTitle} (#{shortTicketId})
newTicketAssigned.body: A new support ticket has been automatically assigned to you.

footer.automatedNotification: This is an automated notification from FireDesk. Please do not reply directly to this email unless instructed.
footer.viewTicketHere: You can view the ticket here.

ticketForm.checkNetworkAndCors: Please check your network connection and ensure the R2 bucket's CORS policy allows uploads from this origin.

adminUsersPage.title: User Management
adminUsersPage.description: View and manage all user roles in the system.
adminUsersPage.noUsersFound: No users found in the system.
adminUsersPage.tableCaption: A list of all registered users.

actionDenied.title: Action Denied
actionDenied.description: You cannot change your own role.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to update role. Please try again.

newTicketPage.title: Create New Support Ticket
newTicketPage.description: Fill out the form below to submit a new support ticket. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
